column5: I bought a coffee grinder way back to do my own dubbing . Finally started to do just that. I look for colors of yarn that are differentÂ  along with fibers. Wool works as well,but I like the yarn so far.  From this,to this, to that . About 2 foot strands make a baggie. No, not that kind of baggie,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
Heck of an idea Misfish, I've used coffee grinders for a lot of things but I never would have thought of that.
That pink one looks like Cotton Candy you buy at the fair.
I played with the grinder lots of fun. Makes those yardsale buys vaulable . I bought half doz striper wigs added to yarn was very interesting. Missing tying all packed up for a move.
You might want to wash the DNA off those "striper" wigs before you handle them too much.
